messages.title: Here are some quick profiles of your candidates - Dr Martin Williams
messages.content: Martin understands and shares your beliefs and aspirations.

messages.title: Dear Resident
messages.content: Only by voting Conservative in Garston and Halewood can you have the Conservatives deliver on their plan.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We have a plan that we want this country to stick to that will deliver a better economy.
We will also deliver a strong NHS, with an extra £8 billion a year by 2020, over and above inflation.
We will lift the cap on University places, so it is estimated 60,000 more young people will benefit from a university education by 2020.
We promise to introduce 30 hours of free childcare for 3-4 year olds.

issues.economy: We have a plan that we want this country to stick to that will deliver a better economy.
issues.education: We will lift the cap on University places, so it is estimated 60,000 more young people will benefit from a university education by 2020.
issues.health: We will also deliver a strong NHS, with an extra £8 billion a year by 2020, over and above inflation.

images.caption: Photo of Dr Martin Williams with a young child.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mainly discusses general Conservative party policy commitments and Dr Martin Williams' support for those commitments.
